conf.project = 'isadora'
conf.author = 'Kolawole Andrew'
conf.copyright = '2026, Kolawole Andrew'
conf.release = '1.2.0'
conf.extensions = ['sphinx.ext.autodoc', 'sphinx.ext.autosummary', 'sphinx.ext.todo', 'sphinx.ext.napoleon',...
conf.autodoc_default_options
conf.autodoc_inherit_docstrings = True
conf.autosummary_generate = True
conf.autoapi_type = 'python'
conf.autoapi_dirs
conf.autoapi_add_toctree_entry = True
conf.autoapi_keep_files = True
conf.autoapi_generate_api_docs = True
conf.napoleon_google_docstring = False
conf.napoleon_numpy_docstring = True
conf.napoleon_include_init_with_doc = True
conf.napoleon_include_private_with_doc = False
conf.napoleon_use_admonition_for_note = False
conf.napoleon_use_param = True
conf.napoleon_use_rtype = True
conf.templates_path = ['_templates']
conf.exclude_patterns = ['_build', 'Thumbs.db', '.DS_Store']
conf.html_theme = 'sphinx_rtd_theme'
conf.html_theme_options
conf.html_static_path = ['_static']

conf.html_logo = '_static/isadora.svg'
conf.latex_engine = 'pdflatex'
